ygData.subject: Stine of Moggok
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes it is possible. At 12lvl Last night I completed the Quest for the Stine.  Clurg was indiferent to me and did not respond to my hails so I held my breath
ygData.messageBody:
Yes it is possible. At 12lvl Last night I completed the Quest for
the Stine. Clurg was indiferent to me and did not respond to my
hails so I held my breath and gave him the book anyway. And lo
and behold I got a stien.

<gate> back to Freeport. Appear and try to /auction the stine and
noone wanted to pay more than 100pp for it. That sounds too low
for me, so I was wondering if anyone has tried to sell them over
in Kel. Was thinking that maybe sence Kel was on another
contonet away from the quest I could get the 200pp for the stine
that I need.

Anyone else sold a stine lately? is 200pp outragious? anyone
had luck selling the stine out side of Freeport/Commons?

Keeping everyone up to date.

--wyntermute
12lvl enchantress, Bristlebain server.
